description:
Tabitha Tucker is a normal girl in a big city who is
trying to make ends meet. One day, she is presented
with a unique offer: spend the rest of her existence
suffering though the day to day hell that is life, OR
give up her freedom for a world of sexual bliss and
constant orgasms and sexual arousal. To become
a sex slave that is pampered to orgasmic exhaustion
every day, or to continue to deal with the harsh
reality of trying to make ends meet - what would you
do?
title: Welcome Tabitha Tucker to her first Hogtied experience.
